SEARCH
Package com.org.Traini8.ExceptionalHandling

Class ErrorResponse

java.lang.Object
com.org.Traini8.ExceptionalHandling.ErrorResponse
public class ErrorResponse extends Object
This class represents the structure of the error response sent to clients when an exception or an error occurs during API requests. It encapsulates details about the error such as status code, error message, timestamp, and the request path that led to the error.

  • Constructor Details

    • ErrorResponse

      public ErrorResponse(LocalDateTime timestamp, int status, String error, String message, String path)
      Constructs an ErrorResponse with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The timestamp at which the error occurred.
      status - The HTTP status code associated with the error.
      error - A brief description of the error type.
      message - A detailed message explaining the error.
      path - The API path that was called when the error occurred.
